updates.title: Diwali Special Offer
updates.body: Get 20% off on all yearly consultation packages. Limited time offer valid until Diwali.

updates.title: New Moon Meditation Session
updates.body: Join our special New Moon meditation and intention-setting session. Free for existing clients.

updates.title: Workshop: Understanding Your Birth Chart
updates.body: Learn to read basic elements of your Vedic birth chart. 3-hour workshop with live Q&A.
